messages.subject: Sandra and Unschooling.
messages.msgSnippet: I realize Sandra may have already un subbed, but I wanted to comment. I have come to respect her immensely for the great regard she has for her children. She
messages.messageBody:
I realize Sandra may have already un subbed, but I wanted to comment.
I have come to respect her immensely for the great regard she has for her
children.
She has tried to say - children can be happy, this is what I know, have
you considered this. She has shown how children, truly loved and
respected can flourish. This has been most encouraging to me,
personally. I'm sorry that a few people have felt trying to prove her
wrong was more important than trying to help us all learn and grow.
Deb L
